intro: Monomeria dichroma, commonly known as the two-colored monomeria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Monomeria dichroma is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and shrublands. Its flowers attract various pollinators, including bees and hummingbirds, due to their nectar-rich structure.
